title: Eight Sleep Pod Cover
summary: Auto-adjusts bed temperature throughout the night. Users report 30%+ better sleep scores.
content:
The Eight Sleep Pod Cover turns any mattress into a smart bed. It circulates water through a thin layer to heat or cool each side independently â€” so you can sleep at 68Â°F while your partner sleeps at 74Â°F. No more thermostat wars.

The real intelligence is in the adaptive algorithm. It learns your sleep patterns and automatically adjusts temperature through the night â€” cooler during deep sleep, warmer before your wake-up time. The gentle thermal alarm replaces jarring phone alarms.

Sleep tracking rivals dedicated devices like Oura, measuring heart rate, HRV, respiratory rate, and sleep stages. Users consistently report 20-30% improvement in sleep scores within the first month. At the price of a good mattress, it's a health investment that pays dividends every single night.

steps.text: Unbox and lay the Pod Cover on top of your mattress (fits like a fitted sheet)
Place the Hub unit next to your bed and connect the water tubes
Fill the Hub with distilled water using the included funnel
Plug in and connect to WiFi via the Eight Sleep app
Set each side's temperature preference (-10 to +10 scale)
Enable Autopilot to let the AI adjust temperature throughout the night
Calibrate over the first week â€” the algorithm learns your patterns
Check your sleep report each morning and adjust as needed
